main.name: Kaustubh Pimparkar
main.bio: I am currently a graduate student at Santa Clara University with a majors in Computer Science and Engineering. I like dabbling in various parts of Web / RPA / C++ development and like to learn about new technologies, go for a hike or simply play games in my free time.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn

resume.skillmessage: * Each skill level is weighted in correlation to the remaining skills

education.degree: M.S. in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Coursework Included: Web Development, Software Engineering, Distributed Systems, Computer Networks, Operating Systems, Cloud Computing, Human-Computer Interaction, Advanced Database Systems.

work.title: Founding Software Engineer
work.description: Led full-stack development of internal dashboards for real-time monitoring of IoT sensor data using ReactJS, PHP, and Python. Built RESTful APIs and backend services to support dynamic data ingestion, alerting, and user access control. Integrated InfluxDB for handling time-series data and implemented role-based access features for field and operations teams. Optimized frontend performance and responsive design to ensure usability across field devices.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed and maintained internal web applications to automate configuration, monitoring, and validation tasks for network devices. Used Flask and ReactJS to build scalable, testable full-stack tools with intuitive UI and robust backend logic. Designed REST APIs to interface with internal systems and improve developer workflows. Enhanced user experience and performance through frontend refactors, while adhering to code quality and CI/CD standards.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Engineered and maintained Transaction and Performance processing with CheckFree’s Global Investment Manager (GIM) system. Designed processes using database programming and shell scripting to do various tasks in the system, including Account Conversion, Performance Scheduling, Sub-Accounting. Created Automation Bots using UiPath to automate the UI Health Check of Banking Applications
